compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-or-later license requires that any derivative works or combined works must also be licensed under GPL-2.0-or-later, which leads to a strong copyleft effect.

key_requirements: Must provide the same freedoms to recipients as received.
Must not impose further restrictions on the rights granted by the license.
Must ensure that any modified versions are also licensed under GPL-2.0-or-later.
license.name: GPL-2.0-or-later
obligations: Distribute copies of the software under the same license.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the software.
Include a copy of the license with any distributed software.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State any changes made to the original software.
